full_summary:
# Request for Proposal

## Solicitation Number
WS4672539017

## Project Title
Repair of Skylights, Roofing, and Cladding of the Iqaluit Government of Canada Building

## Summary
**English:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a qualified contractor to perform the repair of existing skylights, roofing, and cladding of the Iqaluit Government of Canada Building located in Iqaluit, Nunavut.
**French:**
Le Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC) invite un entrepreneur qualifié à effectuer la réparation des fenêtres de toit, du toit et du bardage existants de l'édifice Iqaluit du gouvernement du Canada situé à l'Iqaluit, au Nunavut.

## Project Details
- **Project Location:** Iqaluit, Nunavut
- **Trade Category:** Roofing and Cladding Services
- **Solicitation Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive Bidding

## Contact Information
To obtain more information regarding this project, please contact:
Alex (SPAC/PSPC)
alex.tikhonovitch@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Additional Details
* Notice URL: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20268965?extsite=MjAyNjg5NjVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20268965?extsite=MjAyNjg5NjVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* Contracting Entity Address:
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec
K1A 0S5, Canada

## Closing Date
The closing date for this tender is August 13th, 2024 at 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time (EDT). **English:** Please ensure to submit your proposal prior to the specified closing date, as any late submissions will not be considered. **French:** Assurez-vous de soumettre votre projet avant la date de clôture spécifiée, car tout soumission tarde ne sera pas prise en compte.
